sentences.english: We've talked about the root of the triad.
sentences.chinese: 我们讨论了三和弦的根音。

sentences.english: This is the same as a root with a minor third and a diminished fifth added above it.
sentences.chinese: 同理，根音加小三度，其上加一个减五度。

sentences.english: This is the same as a root with a minor third and a perfect fifth added above it.
sentences.chinese: 同理，加小三度的根音，其上加一个纯五度。

sentences.english: A chord with the root at the bottom is said to be in root position.
sentences.chinese: 底部有根音的和弦为本位和弦。

sentences.english: Often the key will be considered by the players as if played in standard tuning.
sentences.chinese: 通常演奏者在根音上把它看作与标调一样。

sentences.english: This is the same as a root with a major third and a perfect fifth added above it.
sentences.chinese: 同理，加大三度的根音，其上加一个纯五度。
